readable.title: 2657301826_aab4c36e6c
readable.content: a baby wearing a blue bandanna is playing with a set of colored rings . A child in a blue scarf and a tan outfit plays with plastic toys on a rug nearby a soft chair . A toddler in a blue bandanna playing with a set of rings on a stick . A toddler with a blue scarf wrapped on his head plays with a wooden toy . The little boy is wearing a blue bandanna .
